articles.title: Ian Joo
articles.contents: Welcome to my website. I’m Ian from South Korea, currently a PhD student at the Hong Kong Polytechnic University doing research on linguistic typology. My research interests are mainly linguistic iconicity and areal linguistics. In other words, I am interested in (i) the resemblance between form and meaning and (ii) how languages that are spoken close by develop similarities or dissimilarities.
